item.title: BVS Theater - ☆Strawberry Troubles☆ - Episode 001
item.content:encoded:
☆Strawberry Troubles☆ - Episode 001

Strawberry: I know my name is Strawberry, but who the hell gave me such a name? Was it you?
Shorty: Don't look at me… It was most likely the BvS creator…
Strawberry: And that is…
Shorty: The hell if I know, Ask Ori…er…Robogirl.
Strawberry: So Robogirl *weird name also* Do you know.
Robogirl: Beep Bloop Beep Beep Be Be Beep Beep.
Strawberry: Shorty, looks like I'm not gonna get anything useful from her…
Shorty: Don't call me Shorty!… ohhh avoiding Copyright issues Ichi…er…Strawberry… *Wink*
Strawberry: Yea, we don't want to get sued…
The Rack & Hotsumoto: Ichi…er…Strawberry! Tell us which of us have bigger chests!
Strawberry: Oh no! *Brain farts*

How will Ichi…er…Strawberry get out of this trouble…
Look foward to Episode 002 here on BVS Theater

item.title: KuriNoBito, UnmeiNoIto, & 4242564 BVS Wiki Profile Discussions
item.content:encoded:
Talk about my Profile and The BVS Theater Here ^.^
I'll make a new post for Each Episode here, one after another, but the Eps posted below won't have the character image
like in my profile, lol. That way theis forum topic loading of the pages here won't be lagged with gobs of images, lol.

You can post all you want here also if u wanna comment, but now and then a new episode post will be added.
On the Profile, there will be a Link to previous eps to link to the individual post here for archiving purposes.

Enjoy and Welcome ^.^
